symbols.name: sap.ui.export
symbols.description: UI5 library: sap.ui.export - document export utilities

symbols.name: sap.ui.export.EdmType
symbols.description: EDM data types for document export.

context.name: context

version.name: version
version.description: Application version that was used to create this XLSX

title.name: title
title.description: Title of the XLSX document (NOT the file name)

modifiedBy.name: modifiedBy
modifiedBy.description: User context for the exported document

sheetName.name: sheetName
sheetName.description: The name of the data sheet that will be shown in Excel

metaSheetName.name: metaSheetName
metaSheetName.description: The name of the metadata sheet that will be shown in Excel

metainfo.name: metainfo
metainfo.description: Optional Metadata that will be displayed in the additional Metadata Sheet

context.description: Export context that will be applied to the exported file

dataSource.name: dataSource
dataSource.description: Source of spreadsheet data. A JSON array, data source properties map or URL to an OData source can be provided. For example, "someUrl" is an equivalent to {dataUrl:"someUrl", type:"OData"}.

count.name: count
count.description: The maximal number of records to export

worker.name: worker
worker.description:
Run export process in a worker thread. Set to false to disable worker and run export in a main thread. This is needed, for example, if a mock server is used to provide spreadsheet data.
Note: In case of a strict content security policy, it is not always possible to create an export worker. In this case, export runs in a main thread disregarding the worker value.

fileName.name: fileName
fileName.description: Optional file name for the exported file

showProgress.name: showProgress
showProgress.description: Set to false to suppress the progress dialog

methods.name: build

returnValue.description: Promise object. You may use it to track the result of the export process.

methods.description: Loads data from the backend, builds and saves the resulting spreadsheet file. You can use the cancel method to stop a running export.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Cancels a running export process. This method does nothing if no export is running.

methods.name: onprogress

parameters.name: iProgress
parameters.description: A number between 0 and 100 indicates the export progress in percent

methods.description: Progress callback. The function is called when the progress status changes.
